  1. prop 必须为 mForm 中的属性
  2. 这里的 mForm 属性是动态添加的, 使用的是 this.$set()
<el-form :model="mForm">
    <el-row>
        <el-col v-for="(item, index) in fieldList" :key="index" :span="6">
                <el-form-item
                  :label="item.fieldName"
                  label-width="100px"
                  :prop="item.contractHeaderField"
                  :rules="{
                  required: true, message: '不能为空', trigger: 'blur'
                }"
                >
                    <el-input
                        size="small"
                        v-if="item.inputType === 'text'"
                        v-model="mForm[item.contractHeaderField]"
                    ></el-input>
                    <el-date-picker
                        v-model="mForm[item.contractHeaderField]"
                        value-format="yyyy-MM-dd"
                        size="small"
                        type="date"
                        v-if="item.inputType === 'datetime'"
                        placeholder="选择日期"
                        :rules="{
                          required: true, message: '不能为空', trigger: 'blur'
                        }"
                    ></el-date-picker>
                    <el-input-number
                        size="small"
                        :controls="false"
                        v-if="item.inputType === 'number'"
                        v-model="mForm[item.contractHeaderField]"
                        :rules="{
                          required: true, message: '不能为空', trigger: 'blur'
                        }"
                    ></el-input-number>
                </el-form-item>

        </el-col>
    </el-row>
</el-form>

js 的 data 数据

export default {
    data() {
        return {
            mForm: {}
        }
    },
    mounted() {
        this.aaa()    
    },
    methods: {
        aaa() {
            xxx().then(res => {
                res.data.data.forEach(item => {
                   this.$set(this.mForm, item.contractHeaderField, '')
                })
                this.fieldList = data
            })
        }
    }
}

    objectSpanMethod({ rowIndex, columnIndex }) {
      if (columnIndex === 1) {
        const _row = this.spanArr1[rowIndex]
        const _col = _row > 0 ? 1 : 0
        return {
          rowspan: _row,
          colspan: _col,
        }
      }
      if (columnIndex === 2) {
        const _row = this.spanArr2[rowIndex]
        const _col = _row > 0 ? 1 : 0
        return {
          rowspan: _row,
          colspan: _col,
        }
      }
    }
    rowspan() {
      this.tableData.forEach((item, index) => {
        if (index === 0) {
          this.spanArr1.push(1)
          this.position1 = 0
          this.spanArr2.push(1)
          this.position2 = 0
        } else {
          if (
            this.tableData[index].classification ===
            this.tableData[index - 1].classification
          ) {
            this.spanArr1[this.position1] += 1
            this.spanArr1.push(0)
          } else {
            this.spanArr1.push(1)
            this.position1 = index
          }
          if (
            this.tableData[index].region === this.tableData[index - 1].region &&
            this.tableData[index].classification ===
              this.tableData[index - 1].classification
          ) {
            this.spanArr2[this.position2] += 1
            this.spanArr2.push(0)
          } else {
            this.spanArr2.push(1)
            this.position2 = index
          }
        }
      })
    }
  mergeTableRow(data, merge) {
      if (!merge || merge.length === 0) {
        return data
      }
      merge.forEach((m) => {
        const mList = {}
        data = data.map((v, index) => {
          const rowVal = v[m]
          if (mList[rowVal] && mList[rowVal].newIndex === index) {
            mList[rowVal]['num']++
            mList[rowVal]['newIndex']++
            data[mList[rowVal]['index']][m + '-span'].rowspan++
            v[m + '-span'] = {
              rowspan: 0,
              colspan: 0,
            }
          } else {
            mList[rowVal] = { num: 1, index: index, newIndex: index + 1 }
            v[m + '-span'] = {
              rowspan: 1,
              colspan: 1,
            }
          }
          return v
        })
      })
      return data
    }
 rowspan() {
        this.form.tableData.forEach((item, index) => {
          if (item.tag === '1') {
            this.spanArr[index] = 1
            this.position = index + 1
            this.spanArr[this.position] = 1
          } else {
            const first = this.form.tableData[index].materialCode
            const last = this.form.tableData[index + 1] && this.form.tableData[index + 1].materialCode || ''
            if (first === last ) {
              this.spanArr[this.position] += 1
              this.spanArr.push(0)
            } else {
              this.position = index + 1
              this.spanArr[this.position] = 1
            }
          }
        })
      },
      rowspanRight() {
        if (this.titleIdentification !== 'year') {
          const arr = [
            { tableName: 'tableDataDevice', spanName: 'spanArrDevice', codeName: 'equipmentCode', positionName: 'positionDevice' },
            { tableName: 'tableDataShop', spanName: 'spanArrShop', codeName: 'shopCode', positionName: 'positionShop' },
            { tableName: 'tableDataLineBody', spanName: 'spanArrLineBody', codeName: 'lineCode', positionName: 'positionLineBody' }]
          arr.forEach(arrItem => {
            this[arrItem.tableName].forEach((item, index) => {
              if (index === 0) {
                this[arrItem.spanName][index] = 1
                this[arrItem.positionName] = 0
              } else {
                const first = this[arrItem.tableName][index][arrItem.codeName]
                const last = this[arrItem.tableName][index -1][arrItem.codeName]
                if (first === last ) {
                  this[arrItem.spanName][this[arrItem.positionName]] += 1
                  this[arrItem.spanName].push(0)
                } else {
                  this[arrItem.positionName] = index
                  this[arrItem.spanName][this[arrItem.positionName]] = 1
                }
              }
            })
          })
        }
      },
